div.bibl: Dziennik Chicagoski, May 2, 1895. CONTRIBUTIONS FOR THE PROSECUTION OF THE MURDERER OF GOLEMBIESKI AND GACY

body.p: The following contributions were made toward helping in the prosecution of the murderer of Golembieski and Gacy:

row.cell: Through the initiative of Reverend Michael C. Pyplatz, pastor of St. Joseph Parish,
King Mieczyslaw I Society, of Town of Lake,
The Sacred Heart of Mary Society, of St. Adalbert Parish,

body.p: Sincere thanks are extended to the donors.

We beseech all pastors and societies that have not contributed as yet to give
their support to this noble cause, for the protection of the Polish name.
P. S. All contributions should be sent to Anthony Rus, 4811 Paulina Street, Chicago, Illinois.
